publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1167 Richard Lochhead: Draft Quality Meat Scotland Order 2008—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the draft Quality Meat Scotland Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Michael Russell*

S3M-1167 Richard Lochhead: Draft Quality Meat Scotland Order 2008—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the draft Quality Meat Scotland Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Michael Russell
